msg: This is an empty revision for padding.

author: mcconnell
msg: 1. update the avalon reactor template to call "default" for the default goal (this enables usage of the reactor with enclosed ant directives)
2. update the avalon index.xml to delcare build time dependencies on merlin-cli so that we can automate the construction of a path to package the distribution jars
3. reorganize the merlin-cli etc content to reduce custom ant code
4. significantly simplify the cli build procedure though the <x:replicate/> task

author: mcconnell
msg: Update magic to provide support for ant path creation in the form <x:path mode="BUILD" id="my-path"/> enabling better integration of magic resources into classic ant build scenarios.
